trans-unit.source: Creates an object that contains session configuration options for workflow sessions.
trans-unit.target: 建立包含工作流程工作階段之工作階段設定選項的物件。

trans-unit.source: The **New-PSWorkflowExecutionOption** cmdlet creates an object that contains advanced options for workflow session configurations, that is session configurations designed to run Windows PowerShell Workflow workflows.
trans-unit.target: **New-psworkflowexecutionoption** 指令程式建立的物件，其中包含進階的選項的工作流程工作階段設定，是設計用來執行 Windows PowerShell 工作流程工作流程的工作階段設定。

trans-unit.source: You can use the **PSWorkflowExecutionOption** object that **New-PSWorkflowExecutionOption** generates as the value of the *SessionTypeOption* parameter of cmdlets that create or change a session configuration, such as the Register-PSSessionConfiguration and Set-PSSessionConfiguration cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **PSWorkflowExecutionOption** 物件 **New-psworkflowexecutionoption** 產生的值為 *SessionTypeOption* 指令程式，可建立或變更工作階段設定，例如 Register-pssessionconfiguration 和 Set-pssessionconfiguration cmdlet 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Each parameter of the **New-PSWorkflowExecutionOption** cmdlet represents a property of the workflow session configuration option object that the cmdlet returns.
trans-unit.target: 每個參數 **New-psworkflowexecutionoption** 指令程式表示 cmdlet 會傳回工作流程工作階段設定選項物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a parameter, the cmdlet creates the object that has a default value for the property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定參數，cmdlet 會建立具有屬性的預設值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The **New-PSWorkflowExecutionOption** cmdlet is part of the Windows PowerShell Workflow feature.
trans-unit.target: **New-psworkflowexecutionoption** cmdlet 是 Windows PowerShell 工作流程功能的一部分。

trans-unit.source: You can also add workflow common parameters to this command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以新增工作流程一般參數到此命令。

trans-unit.source: For more information about workflow common parameters, see about_WorkflowCommonParameters.
trans-unit.target: 如需工作流程一般參數的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_WorkflowCommonParameters。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引進。

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Create a workflow options object
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 建立工作流程選項物件

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **New-PSWorkflowExecutionOption** cmdlet to increase the *MaxSessionsPerWorkflow* value to 10 and decrease the *MaxDisconnectedSessions* value to 200.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **New-psworkflowexecutionoption** 指令程式可增加 *MaxSessionsPerWorkflow* 值到 10，並減少 *MaxDisconnectedSessions* 200 的值。

trans-unit.source: The output shows the object that the cmdlet returns.
trans-unit.target: 輸出會顯示 Cmdlet 傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Using a workflow options object
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 使用工作流程選項物件

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use a workflow options object to establish or change the workflow options in a session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示如何使用工作流程選項物件來建立或變更工作階段設定中的工作流程選項。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how long each activity host process is maintained after the process becomes idle.
trans-unit.target: 指定程序變成閒置狀態之後會保持每個活動主機處理序的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: When the interval expires, the process closes.
trans-unit.target: 當間隔時間過期時，處理程序就會關閉。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the activities that are permitted to run in the session.
trans-unit.target: 指定允許在工作階段中執行的活動。

trans-unit.source: Enter namespace-qualified activity names, such as `Microsoft.Powershell.HyperV.Activities.*`.
trans-unit.target: 輸入命名空間限定的活動名稱，例如 `Microsoft.Powershell.HyperV.Activities.*`。

trans-unit.source: The default value, **PSDefaultActivities**, includes the built-in Windows Workflow Foundation activities and the activities that represent the Windows PowerShell Core cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 預設值， **PSDefaultActivities**, ，包括內建的 Windows Workflow Foundation 活動和代表 Windows PowerShell 核心 cmdlet 的活動。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet verifies that all workflow activities in the session are included in the allowed activities list.
trans-unit.target: 表示此指令程式會驗證工作階段中的所有工作流程活動，包含在允許的活動清單。

trans-unit.source: To disable validation, use the following command format: `-EnableValidation:$False`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用驗證，請使用下列的命令格式︰ `-EnableValidation:$False`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of processes that can be created in the session to support workflow activities.
trans-unit.target: 指定可在工作階段中建立以支援工作流程活動的處理程序數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of remote sessions that are in an operational state.
trans-unit.target: 指定處於操作狀態的遠端工作階段數目上限。

trans-unit.source: This quota is applied to sessions connected to all remote nodes, or target computers.
trans-unit.target: 這個配額會套用至所有遠端節點，或目標電腦所連線的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of remote sessions that are in a disconnected state.
trans-unit.target: 指定處於中斷連線狀態的遠端工作階段數目上限。

trans-unit.source: This quota is applied to sessions connected to all remote nodes, or target computers.
trans-unit.target: 這個配額會套用至所有遠端節點，或目標電腦所連線的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum size, in gigabytes, of the persistence store allocated to workflows that run in the session.
trans-unit.target: 指定配置給在工作階段中執行之工作流程的持續性儲存區大小上限 (單位為 GB)。

trans-unit.source: When the size is exceeded, the persistence store is expanded to save all persisted data, but a warning is displayed and a message is written to the workflow event log.
trans-unit.target: 超過該大小時，會擴充持續性儲存區以儲存所有持續性資料，但會顯示警告並寫入一個訊息到工作流程事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The persistence store contains data for all workflow jobs.
trans-unit.target: 持續性儲存區包含所有工作流程工作的資料。

trans-unit.source: The ability to store data allows for the jobs to resume without losing state.
trans-unit.target: 儲存資料的能力可讓工作繼續執行，而不會遺失狀態。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that maximum number of workflows that can run in the session at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 指定可以同時工作階段中執行的工作流程的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of sessions that can be connected to each remote node, or target computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定可以連線至每個遠端節點或目標電腦的工作階段的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of session that can be created to support each workflow.
trans-unit.target: 指定可以建立以支援每個工作流程的工作階段數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Determines which allowed activities specified by the *AllowedActivities* parameter run out-of-process.
trans-unit.target: 決定哪些允許的活動所指定 *AllowedActivities* 參數執行跨處理序。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the workflow encrypts the data in the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 表示工作流程持續性存放區資料加密。

trans-unit.source: Consider using this feature when storing persistence data in a network share.
trans-unit.target: 將持續性資料儲存在網路共用時，請考慮使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the location on disk where workflow state and data are stored.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來儲存工作流程狀態與資料的磁碟位置。

trans-unit.source: Storing the workflow state and data allows for workflows to be suspended and resumed, and to recover from interruptions and network failures.
trans-unit.target: 儲存工作流程狀態和資料可讓工作流程暫停並繼續，以及為從中斷復原和網路故障。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how long a session that is connected to a remote node, or target computer, is maintained if it is idle.
trans-unit.target: 指定連接到遠端節點或目標電腦，會保留成為閒置時間工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how many operations are created to support all workflows started in the session.
trans-unit.target: 指定要建立多少操作以支援在工作階段中啟動的所有工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how long the session is maintained after all workflows in the session are forcibly suspended.
trans-unit.target: 指定強制暫停工作階段中的所有工作流程之後，應該保留該工作階段多久。

trans-unit.source: When the time-out expires, Windows PowerShell closes the session, even if all workflows are not yet suspended.
trans-unit.target: 當逾時值時，Windows PowerShell 會關閉工作階段，即使所有工作流程未尚未暫止。
輸入以毫秒為單位的值。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用管線傳送輸入至此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: When the maximum value set by an option is exceeded, the command to create another instance in the session fails, unless noted in the parameter description.
trans-unit.target: 超過此選項所設定的最大值時，用來在工作階段中建立另一個執行個體的命令會失敗，除非在參數描述中另有設定。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the value of *MaxConnectedSessions* is 100.
The command to create the 101st session to a remote node, or target computer, fails.
trans-unit.target: 建立 101st 工作階段到遠端節點或目標電腦，則命令會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The properties of a session configuration object vary with the options set for the session configuration and the values of those options.
trans-unit.target: 工作階段設定物件的屬性取決於工作階段設定所設定的選項，以及這些選項的值。

trans-unit.source: Also, session configurations that use a session configuration file have additional properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用工作階段設定檔的工作階段設定會有額外的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the properties of session configurations that include a **PSWorkflowExecutionOptions** object vary based on the workflow option values.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，工作階段設定的屬性包括 **PSWorkflowExecutionOptions** 物件而異的工作流程選項值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the session configuration includes a **PSWorkflowExecutionOptions** object that sets a non-default value for the **SessionThrottleLimit** property, the session configuration has a **SessionThrottleLimit** property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果工作階段設定包含 **PSWorkflowExecutionOptions** 設定非預設值的物件 **SessionThrottleLimit** 屬性，工作階段設定具有 **SessionThrottleLimit** 屬性。
